divs: Sighting DetailsWas at work near stateline california.I was walking west and they caught my eye I don't know what they are. But they are round silver spheres I could see the light from sun reflecting off them. They moved slowly overhead for about one minute then made a sharp 90 degree turn northeast I could see air pressure as they turned they shot off at a speed I can't even describe.totally clear skies. All I can say is there amazing whatever they are.
Summary: two silver spheres moving slow northwest. abrupt turn northeast at amazing speed.
trends: There have been no other sightings in nipton
This sighting has never been favorited.
